articles.content: WASHINGTON: President Joe Biden singled out a "growing rivalry with China" as a key challenge facing the United States, with his top diplomat describing the Asian country as "the biggest geopolitical… [+2734 chars]
articles.description: WASHINGTON: President Joe Biden singled out a "growing rivalry with China" as a key challenge facing the United States, with his top diplomat describing the Asian country as "the biggest geopolitical test" of this century.
articles.title: Biden administration singles out China as 'biggest geopolitical test' for US - CNA

articles.title: Woman dies from brain haemorrhage in Japan days after Covid-19 vaccine, but link uncertain - AsiaOne

articles.description: TAIPEI — Taiwanese singer Show Lo received backlash from Chinese netizens yesterday (March 1) after he bought 200 boxes of Taiwan pineapples. The news came as China announced that it would ban the import of the fruit from Taiwan after they allegedly found thr…
articles.title: Show Lo gets backlash from Chinese netizens after buying 200 boxes of Taiwan pineapples - AsiaOne

articles.description: SINGAPORE — Outsiders have little influence on Myanmar’s “enormous tragic step back”,  Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong has said, expressing his wish for wisdom to prevail in the Southeast Asian nation and for the recently-installed military junta to work out a…
articles.title: In his first comments since Myanmar's Feb 1 coup, PM Lee expresses hope wisdom will prevail after 'tragic step back' - TODAYonline
